sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from 'src/app/services/api.service'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { public shortenedUrls: any = []; constructor(private auth: AuthService, private api: ApiService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.api.getShortenedUrls() .subscribe(res => { this.shortenedUrls = res; }) } logOut(){ this.auth.signOut(); } }
